Do*r not*r be*r like*r them,*r for*r your*r Father*r knows*r what*r you*r need*r before*r you*r ask*r him.*r
“This,*rp then,*r is*r how*r you*r should*r pray:*r “ ‘Our*rpn Father*r in*r heaven,*r hallowed*rln be*r your*r name,*r
your*rln kingdom*r come,*r your*rln will*r be*r done,*r on*rld earth*r as*r it*r is*r in*r heaven.*r
Give*rln us*r today*r our*r daily*r bread.*r
And*rln forgive*r us*r our*r debts,*r as*rld we*r also*r have*r forgiven*r our*r debtors.*r
And*rln lead*r us*r not*r into*r temptation,*r but*rld deliver*r us*r from*r the*r evil*r one.’*r

But*r if*r you*r do*r not*r forgive*r others*r their*r sins,*r your*r Father*r will*r not*r forgive*r your*r sins.*r

But*r when*r you*r fast,*r put*r oil*r on*r your*r head*r and*r wash*r your*r face,*r

But*r store*r up*r for*r yourselves*r treasures*r in*r heaven,*r where*r moths*r and*r vermin*r do*r not*r destroy,*r and*r where*r thieves*r do*r not*r break*r in*r and*r steal.*r

Do Not Worry

“Therefore*rp I*r tell*r you,*r do*r not*r worry*r about*r your*r life,*r what*r you*r will*r eat*r or*r drink;*r or*r about*r your*r body,*r what*r you*r will*r wear.*r Is*r not*r life*r more*r than*r food,*r and*r the*r body*r more*r than*r clothes?*r

Can*r any*r one*r of*r you*r by*r worrying*r add*r a*r single*r hour*r to*r your*r life?*r
